title: Ryan Reynolds confirms he and Blake Lively welcomed a 3rd daughter
text:
In a tweet touting the importance of voting for green climate policy in his native Canada's elections on Monday, Ryan Reynolds confirmed he and wife Blake Lively welcomed their third daughter.

Along with a photo of himself and Lively in a forest with their infant in Canada, Reynolds wrote, "I want my daughters to experience the same natural playground I grew up in."

"On Oct. 21, the candidate you vote for will SHAPE CLIMATE POLICY. I'm proud of the climate progress made the last 4 years," he wrote, adding the hashtag #Capilano, referring to their picturesque apparent setting.

Lively, 32, revealed in May that she and Reynolds, 42, were expecting their third child.

They are also parents to daughters James, 4, and Inez, 2.
